General.Name: New Hope Dairy Co Ltd
General.Description: New Hope Dairy Co., Ltd. produces and sells dairy products in China. It offers liquid milk, milk-containing beverages and milk powder. The company was founded in1986 and is headquartered in Chengdu, China.

3.Name: Mr. Shifeng  Zheng
3.Title: Sec. to the Board & Assistant to the Pres
